findBook

public java.util.List findBook(java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> parameters)
Method to finding books in the CLI. Result list has Map elements with keys: 
 Key:          Type of value:
 FOUND         List<Book>
 FOUNDMISSING  List<Book>
 LIBNAME       String

Parameters:
parameters - Parameters for finding books.

orderBook

public java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.Object> orderBook(java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> parameters)
Method for ordering the book in the CLI. Result has Map with keys: 
 Keys:    Types of values:
 COMMAND  String
 
 OK       Book
 or
 RESERVED Book

Parameters:
parameters - for ordering the book.

returnBook

public java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.Object> returnBook(java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> parameters)
Method for returning the book in the CLI. Result has Map with keys: 
 Keys:           Types of values:
 COMMAND  String

 OK              Book
 or
 ALREADYRETURNED Book

Parameters:
parameters - Parameters for returning the book.
